Package net.sf.jstuff.core.collection

Class ObjectCache<K,V>

java.lang.Object
net.sf.jstuff.core.collection.ObjectCache<K,V>
public final class ObjectCache<K,V> extends Object
Thread-safe in-memory object cache.
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ObjectCache()
    Creates a new cache where all cached objects are soft-referenced (i.e. only garbage collected if JVM needs to free memory)
    ObjectCache(boolean useWeakValueReferences)
     
    ObjectCache(int maxObjectsToKeep)
     
    ObjectCache(int maxObjectsToKeep, boolean useWeakValueReferences)

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectCache

      public ObjectCache()
      Creates a new cache where all cached objects are soft-referenced (i.e. only garbage collected if JVM needs to free memory)

    • ObjectCache

      public ObjectCache(boolean useWeakValueReferences)

    • ObjectCache

      public ObjectCache(int maxObjectsToKeep)
      Parameters:
      maxObjectsToKeep - the maximum number of cached objects that is guaranteed not to be garbage collected, a value lower 1 means all objects are subject to garbage collection

    • ObjectCache

      public ObjectCache(int maxObjectsToKeep, boolean useWeakValueReferences)
      Parameters:
      maxObjectsToKeep - the maximum number of cached objects that is guaranteed not to be garbage collected, a value lower 1 means all objects are subject to garbage collection
